Interface ReservationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReservationServiceImpl
public interface ReservationService
Service interface for managing item reservations. Allows users to reserve items that are currently unavailable.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • createReservation

      Reservation createReservation(int userId, int itemId)
      Creates a new reservation for an item.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user making the reservation
      itemId - the ID of the item to reserve
      Returns:
      the created Reservation object
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if reservation cannot be created

    • cancelReservation

      void cancelReservation(int reservationId, int userId)
      Cancels a reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to cancel
      userId - the ID of the user canceling (must be the owner)
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if reservation cannot be canceled

    • fulfillNextReservation

      Reservation fulfillNextReservation(int itemId)
      Fulfills a reservation when the item becomes available. This should be called when an item is returned.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the returned item
      Returns:
      the fulfilled reservation, or null if no active reservations

    • getUserReservations

      List<Reservation> getUserReservations(int userId)
      Gets all reservations for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of reservations

    • getActiveUserReservations

      List<Reservation> getActiveUserReservations(int userId)
      Gets active reservations for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of active reservations

    • getItemReservationQueue

      List<Reservation> getItemReservationQueue(int itemId)
      Gets the reservation queue for a specific item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item
      Returns:
      list of active reservations ordered by date

    • expireOldReservations

      int expireOldReservations()
      Expires old reservations that are past their expiry date. Should be run periodically (e.g., daily).
      Returns:
      count of expired reservations

    • getQueuePosition

      int getQueuePosition(int reservationId)
      Gets the position of a reservation in the queue for an item.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation
      Returns:
      the position (1-based), or -1 if not found or not active

    • hasActiveReservation

      boolean hasActiveReservation(int userId, int itemId)
      Checks if a user has an active reservation for an item.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      itemId - the ID of the item
      Returns:
      true if user has an active reservation, false otherwise
